text: Kailyn Lowry Sets The Record Straight : “ I Didn ’ t Leave Javi For Anyone ” by 0 Shares Advertisement Kailyn Lowry is still playing coy about whether she ’ s gay or straight, but there ’ s one thing she ’ s certainly okay with confirming — she did not leave her husband for anyone. The Teen Mom 2 rumor mill has been busier than usual this week ever since Kail posted ( and deleted ) a Snapchat photo in which she ’ s kissing her gay best friend, Rebecca Hayter, on the lips. PHOTOS : Kailyn And Her Rumored Gal Pal Certainly Aren ’ t Denying Those Rumors Now the internet is convinced they ’ re a couple... even blaming Becky for causing a rift in her
